verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
BASS: Ni nani aliye sawa na wewe,
Ni nani aliye sawa na wewe
Bikira Maria, Maria. x2
(Wewe ndiwe faraja ya wagonjwa
sababu ya furaha yetu,
hata patikana kama wewe Maria.) x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ewe mama mpendelevu
mama Maria-a,
wewe m-nara wa pembe
mama Maria.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ewe kio-o cha haki
mama Maaria,
mama usiye na dhambi
mama Maria.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hakuna m-fano wako
mama Ma-ariaa,
na wala hatakuwepo
mama Maria.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mama bikira Maria
utuo-ombee,
ni sanduku la agano
mama Maria.
